<f:comment>
this is comment
</f:comment>
for loop
<f:for each="{posts}" as="post" key="key" iteration="iterator">
    {post}
</f:for>

if condition
<f:if condition="{condition}">
    <f:then>
        do this
    </f:then>
    <f:else>
        do that
    </f:else>
</f:if>

{f:if(condition:'{iterator.cycle} == 1',then:'active',else:'test')}

translate

<f:translate key="{msg_id}" arguments="{1: '{f:format.date(date: record.validend, format: \'d.m.Y H:i:s\')}'}" />
